Description:
Detects a rundll32 that communicates with public IP addresses

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Rundll32 Internet Connection
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and initiated = 'true') and  not ((dst_ip cidr '127.0.0.0/8' or dst_ip cidr '10.0.0.0/8' or dst_ip cidr '172.16.0.0/12' or dst_ip cidr '192.168.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '169.254.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '::1/128' or dst_ip cidr 'fe80::/10' or dst_ip cidr 'fc00::/7') or (dst_ip cidr '20.0.0.0/8' or dst_ip cidr '51.103.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '51.104.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '51.105.0.0/16') or command like '%\system32\pcasvc.dll,pcapatchsdbtask' or src_host like '%.internal.cloudapp.net' or (parent_process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\svchost.exe' and dst_port = '443')))
